snippet: The British police on Monday evacuated an area around the home of a British-Iraqi family targeted in last week’s killing in the French Alps.
abstract: British police send bomb squad to search home of British-Iraqi Hilli family targeted in a killing in the French Alps, in which four members of the family were killed; search is one more twist in a story of murder and mystery that has seized headlines for days in both Britain and France.

byline.original: By SANDY MACASKILL and JOHN F. BURNS
byline.contributor: Sandy Macaskill reported from Claygate, England, and John F. Burns from London. Alan Cowell contributed reporting from London.

lead_paragraph: The British police on Monday evacuated an area around the home of a British-Iraqi family targeted in last week’s killing in the French Alps.

headline.seo: British Police Evacuate Area Around Home of Alps Murder Victims
headline.main: British Bomb Squad Visits Home of Murder Victims
headline.print_headline: British Bomb Squad Visits Home of Murder Victims
